title: Google\Cloud\BigQuery\Migration\V2\ErrorLocation
name: ErrorLocation
description:
Holds information about where the error is located.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.bigquery.migration.v2.ErrorLocation

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.line
params.description: Optional. If applicable, denotes the line where the error occurred. A zero value means that there is no line information.

params.name: data.column
params.description: Optional. If applicable, denotes the column where the error occurred. A zero value means that there is no columns information.
